Benchmark Different Implementations of cone_radius

benchmark_cone_radius.Rd

Benchmarks various implementations of the cone_radius function for a predefined sequence of values and number of iterations. By default, benchmarks all implementations on a sequence of 1000 values over 100 iterations.

Arguments

implementations

A named list of functions to benchmark. Defaults to:

  • For_Loop: cone_radius_for

  • Purrr_Map: cone_radius_map

  • Apply: cone_radius_apply

  • Direct_Vectorized: cone_radius_vectorized_direct

  • Rcpp: cone_radius_cpp

x_values

A numeric vector representing the heights to test (default: seq(0, 10, length.out = 1000)).

times

An integer specifying the number of iterations for the benchmark (default: 100).

plot

A logical value indicating whether to generate a plot of the results (default: FALSE).

Value

A microbenchmark object containing the benchmark results.

Examples

# Default benchmark
benchmark_cone_radius()
#> Unit: microseconds
#>               expr     min       lq      mean   median      uq      max neval
#>           For_Loop  98.384 100.5530 102.56037 101.7150 104.250  120.996   100
#>          Purrr_Map 630.167 646.6975 734.94870 665.7185 874.418  948.241   100
#>              Apply 607.374 617.7385 732.83678 634.6105 857.527 3624.860   100
#>  Direct_Vectorized  38.802  42.1035  61.37021  45.2850  88.019  100.448   100
#>               Rcpp   7.965   9.4825  12.41611  10.9450  13.114   70.883   100

# Custom benchmark
benchmark_cone_radius(
  implementations = list(
    For_Loop = cone_radius_for,
    Rcpp = cone_radius_cpp
  ),
  x_values = seq(0, 10, length.out = 500),
  times = 50,
  plot = TRUE
)

#> Unit: microseconds
#>      expr    min     lq     mean  median     uq     max neval
#>  For_Loop 49.332 50.014 56.72058 50.4240 51.346 261.759    50
#>      Rcpp  5.390  5.561  6.22304  5.6955  5.881  25.207    50
